Text:
Oh, and by the way, I hope you know that if you have installed DirectVobSub from the K-Lite package you don't have to unrar the subtitles -- keep them exactly as they are, and DVS will unpack them on the fly.

I didn't know this myself until recently, so maybe there are more of you out there that didn't either... :)
